title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve
title_original: QIXING Womens Casual Lightweight Cardigan with Pocketes Long Sleeve Open Front Cardigan

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cardigan comfortable, soft, and lightweight, with accurate color representation and a stylish appearance. They appreciate its versatility, with one customer noting it's great for both dress up and down occasions. The material thickness receives mixed feedback, with several customers finding it too thin. The pocket size is also a concern for multiple customers.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, elegant, and perfect for any occasion!
items.body: I bought this cardigan because I was looking for something comfortable yet stylish, and I loved it. The fabric is very soft to the touch, lightweight but warm—perfect for fall or for wearing at the office. The fit is very flattering, it fits well without being tight, and it goes with everything—jeans, dresses, or dress pants. Read more
items.author: Liena Hernandez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice
items.body: Beautiful top. It isn’t to thick or to thin. There isn’t much stretch, so depending on how you like things to fit you may want to size up. It’s great quality and very comfortable! Read more
items.author: Laken Lawhorn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy/needs better pockets
items.body: It’s very soft and comfortable. My only complaint is the pockets aren’t in the right place and aren’t wide or deep enough Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dress up or down
items.body: This is just the right length, thickness and texture. I love it. Read more
items.author: Clarissa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok for price
items.body: Color is great and love the pockets. Material is very thin. Read more
items.author: Amy Anderson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value
items.body: Fit as expected. Nice light weight to wear in office. Read more
items.author: Sherry Kempster

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Runs Really Small
items.body: This is a nice cardigan. It runs really small. The pockets are strange. They don’t lay flat and stick out on the sides. The fabric is awesome and looks really expensive, but the pockets ruin everything. I am returning. Read more
items.author: Jennifer F.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Green Cardigan
items.body: Its not to heavy to wear year round yet perfect for cooler weather. It's true to size and the length is compatible with any outfit. Read more
items.author: Lin Kar

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A03 Navy Blue, A05 Purple Red, A11 Fp-leopard Khaki, A06 Royal Blue, A10 Fp-navy Blue Flower, A01 Black, A02 Red, A04 Army Green, A09 Fp-khaki Ink Flower, A12 Fp-black White Ripple, A07 Gray, A08 Fp-wide Stripe Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
